title: BMaaS — 03 Network Fabric Monitoring
description: NVLink switches, port health, bandwidth, NMX compute/GPU/switch/domain health, InfiniBand throughput and errors, GPU fabric status.

panels.title: NVLink Port Link State
panels.description: RF_NVLink_Resource_LinkState — per-port link status. Active = healthy.

panels.title: NVLink Port RX Bandwidth
panels.description: RF_NVLink_Port_RX — receive throughput per NVLink port.

panels.title: NVLink Port TX Bandwidth
panels.description: RF_NVLink_Port_TX — transmit throughput per NVLink port.

panels.title: NMX Domain Health
panels.description: nmxm_domain_health_count — domain health aggregation. Unhealthy = multi-node at risk.

panels.title: IB Data Received
panels.description: ib_rcv_data — InfiniBand receive throughput per port.

panels.title: IB Data Transmitted
panels.description: ib_xmit_data — InfiniBand transmit throughput per port.

panels.title: GPU Fabric Status per GPU
panels.description: gpu_fabric_status — shows which GPUs are included/excluded from NVLink domains.
